【Multi-functional Camera for Kids】Ourlife Waterproof camera for kids equipped with 1080P HD and 2K photos, 1.77-inch IPS screen, clearly capture kids joy time with friends and family . Underwater camera for kids provides 7 colorful filter effects, 6 kinds of funny picture frames, time-lapse photo function.

【Powerful Kids Camera】Underwater Camera Continuously taking photos for 2 hours or 1 hours continuous recording excellent video after full charged! ,Automatic shut-off if no operation to preserve battery life, Come with 1*USB data line & 1*8GB micro SD card to store thousands of photo!

【Great Toys for Kids】Waterproof Camera Underwater Perfect for birthday, Christmas, festival ,holiday gifts for boys and girls aged 3-12. Children love taking photo with this cute toddler camera. Capture scene or animals indoor&outdoor with families, let kids experience more fun from nature and photography.

【Other Accessories & After Service】Package includes kids waterproof camera, 8GB card, lanyard, helmet mount,a helmet belt and a bicycle mount,allows the kids camera to be attached to any flat surface (skateboards, helmets) and bikes.We offer 1 year warranty and free customer service for life. Please contact us with any issues.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Have your kids record their memorable moments with sound. Durable, withstands drops. Supports photography and video with the ability to replay and delete both. Recommended for children 4-12 years old Records HD 1080p video -- Takes 5.0 MP still photos Integrated 1.77-inch LCD screen -- Built-in rechargeable Li-ion battery Fixed focus lens -- MicroSD card slot (up to 32GB)

Underwater Camera For Kids The Ourlife Kids Camera comes with a waterproof case. With our waterproof case, you can shoot underwater up to 30 metres (100 feet) to get amazing photos! Diversification Of Use Scenarios Complete with a versatile mounting kit, the Ourlife Kids Underwater Camera can be mounted and used on children's helmets, scooters and more to record life's exciting moments! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera for Kids
reviews.reviewText: If my seven your old daughter is anything like yours she is fascinated by taking her own photos and movies. She actually has her own iPad, which we've tried to encourage her to use for this, but she really wanted a physical camera. This camera fits the bill and she loves it. And it does lots of things we wouldn't want her to do with the iPad - like taking it running around the playground, or in the sprinkler. Haven't had the chance to try it in a pool yet but she's excited about that too.* Image quality - I've have inexpensive cameras like this in the past and this is better than previous ones I've had. Yes it's a little challenged in low light, but it really shines when the kids take it running around outdoors anyway. In those kinds of applications the image quality is great. The waterproof case does not impact the image quality at all.* Ease of use - it only has a few buttons so you have to get used to what they do. After the kids figure this out it goes just fine. May require a grownup to get the video/photos off the memory card and onto the big screen, but we have a cheap memory card reader and that process is pretty easy.* Features - has some fun filters and things for the kids. Not my cup of tea but the kids love it.* Durability - we just leave this thing in the waterproof case pretty much all the time. It provides significant shock protection as well so no concerns. Give it to the kids and let them at it.Bottom line - if you're looking for a way to satisfy your kid's desired to take their own photos and videos this camera is a great choice. It's also fun to get a "kids eye view" into their play - watching the videos taken from their perspective is enjoyable for grownups too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No complaints for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera as a cheapie under water camera for a snorkeling excursion. It was the cheapest under water camera on Amazon. I didn't even care that it had hearts on it. The picture quality wasn't amazing but for under $20, I would say it was great. It's waterproof, and simple to use. Zoom is good too. Only downside is the screen doesn't have good brightness, so a little hard to see the screen outside in sunlight. And the water lock can be knocked open with your hand if you aren't cautious. Would buy again, if I had to, but my camera is good to go for future underwater use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for 10 year old to use and great customer service
reviews.reviewText: This is an update after 2 months. After about 1 month the camera quit working. It appeared to charge, but wouldn't turn on. I contacted customer service and they immediately sent another one to my son. Very impressed with the customer service and the 2nd camera has been great.My son has thoroughly enjoyed this camera. It is rather cold where we live so we have not tested the underwater feature yet. It has lasted well over the past 2 weeks. He has enjoyed attaching it to his bike and also attaching it to his remote control car. We have had to help him very little with it. The one negative thing with it is that the microphone doesn't hardly work at all with the case on it. With a 10 year old boy using it I feel much better with the case on most of the time, but unfortunately we are sacrificing audio for that.Overall, I would recommend this to kids ages 6-12.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great lil camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera came with a waterproof case! Amazing! My daughter loves swimming and taking pictures of our dog in the pool! It also came with a bike stand that we are looking forward to putting on her bike for some cool action videos. This thing came with tons of accessories and will keep my daughter entertained with hours of picture taking and videos. Great size and my daughter loves the design on the front.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars On the fence
reviews.reviewText: We got two for Christmas, one for each child. The cameras are cute, small for children hands, and truly waterproof. I like that the cameras are rechargeable (not on disposable batteries) and that they use card (easy to retrieve the pics if the cameras break). The lanyard did not last past the first 10 minutes - the little piece of plastic where the lanyard holds the camera broke in both cameras, really fast. After one month of use (and abuse), one camera is out of service. The photo shutter stays pushed down and the camera won't turn on. Thankfully we could retrieve the pictures as they were on a card. The quality of the pics is mediocre - especially the colors - but honestly my kids don't do art :). I have 15 pics of toes (the same toes) if you know what I mean - so it does not bother me. Videos are fun. I regret that the cameras are not shock proof, and also that the pictures are so easy to erase. My daughter erased all first 400 pics she took because she did not understand what "reset" or "format" (I don't remember the exact terminology) meant in the menu. Similarly, in view mode, if you press (I think it's the photo shutter button) it goes to "delete". This should not be that easy - at least there should be a warning message. Conversely, the menu can be really complicated for kids. Long story short I will probably try another brand for the replacement - to see how they compare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is amazing
reviews.reviewText: I definitely recommend this for kids. Great picture quality and many accessories. My sister is esthetic to be able to record in the pool

L'appareil-photo "Kids Camera" d'Ourlife m'a été livré juste quelques jours après la commande.C'est effectivement un appareil destiné aux enfants : petit, léger et facile d'utilisation, il est même utilisable sous l'eau (jusqu'à 10 mètres) : Il permettra à mon petit-fils de créer ses propres souvenirs en photographiant ou en filmant ce qui lui plaît.Il devrait aimer…
Acheté pour ma fille de 7ans et elle est vraiment ravie!elle ne la quitte plus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: It been tested in the bath already and all good!!
reviews.reviewText: My iPhone 6 was dropped down the toilet taking photos, so I glad this had finally arrived because they were out of stock for a while with most sellers but now we have our hands on one and for a great price as well!!It’s very small and fits in my daughters pocket the quality of the pictures are pretty good and she’s tested it in the bath tonight and it survived its first water encounter.She is going to attach it to her snorkel mask when we go on holiday next month but I need a blue one for my son now, but he’ll have to wait until pay day.It comes with accessories to hopefully attach itself perfectly on her mask so she can snorkel and take pictures at the same time.My daughter has taken it to bed so her brother cannot use it ha ha!!I love my gadgets and it’s a great way of starting your young ones into the technological world!!

La compramos para el cumpleaños de mi hija de 9 años y la verdad que tanto ella como su hermano mas pequeño estan encantados. Tiene un tamaño perfecto para sus manos y el funcionamiento es muy sencillo asi que a los 5 minutos ya estaban haciendo fotos y videos como locos. La hemos probado en la playa bajo el agua y muy bien. Las fotos en la pantalla se ven bien de calidad, como la camara de un movil normal. Por el precio tampoco se puede pedir mas! Totalmente recomendable la compra.

Compré esta cámara para que mis hijos la usen en nuestra piscina o alrededor de la casa.Mis hijos constantemente roban mi teléfono para tomar fotos, así que pensé que les conseguiría una cámara que podrían llevar al exterior, usar en la casa o en la piscina.Han estado divirtiéndose tomando fotos y videos el uno del otro en la piscina bajo el agua. Es realmente fácil de usar y los pequeños botones son perfectos para los dedos meñiques. La calidad de la imagen no es la mejor pero está bien para mis hijos. Me gusta que venga con una correa para la muñeca, así que cuando la traemos los niños no la dejan caer.Cámara de acción realmente genial para niños sin un alto precio.
